nodes.text: Corf Sarb was a male Enu, who lived during the time of the New Republic.

Corf Sarb was born on the planet Deylerax in 35 BBY. Sarb joined the Galactic Empire and embezzled from them in order to start his own criminal empire. Although a relatively minor crime lord, Sarb run a profitable smuggling operation and several gambling establishments on Deylerax. On the charges of smuggling, accessory to murder of New Republic personnel, and racketeering, the New Republic posted a reward of 25,000 credits for Sarb's capture.

Corf Sarb was a male member of the Near-Human Enu species who was 1.3 meters tall. Sarb was extremely intelligent and did not pose much of a physical threat, although he was willing to kill to protect his interests.

Sarb was skilled in the use of a blaster, and could operate both ground and hover vehicles. He was also able to plot courses through hyperspace, and repair computers and droids. Sarb was knowledgeable about bureaucratic procedure, especially in relation to Deylerax, and business practices with a specialty in accounting. He was also aware of the value of spice.
Sarb carried a hold-out blaster, as well as a datapad and comlink.
Corf Sarb was profiled in Wanted by Cracken, a 1993 sourcebook released by West End Games.
